level.text: This chapter shall apply to applicants for and holders of a license to practice social work.
Chapters 40 (Health Occupations: General Rules) and 41 (Health Occupations: Administrative Procedures) of this title shall supplement this chapter.

All applicants for issuance, renewal, reinstatement, or reactivation of a social work license in the District of Columbia shall undergo a criminal background check in accordance with chapter 85 of title 17 of the District of Columbia Municipal Regulations.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 35 DCR 1052 (February 19, 1988); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 52 DCR 10686 (December 9, 2005); as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 4209 (May 4, 2012).
